text: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth are still very much an item, despite a recent report speculating that the couple had broken up. But don't expect them to make any grand public appearances soon. Instead, the pair are going to be laying low for a while so they can have as much privacy as possible. Which means you might not see any cute couple antics on Instagram stories for a while. According to the latest update on their relationship, Cyrus and Hemsworth are ` ` very much still together and have just been trying to be more private about their relationship,'' a source told E!
